thread.title_full: Mann Ki Baat LIVE updates: PM Narendra Modi hails ISRO’s success, ballistic missile test

author: FE Online
title: Mann Ki Baat LIVE updates: PM Narendra Modi hails ISRO’s success, ballistic missile test
text:
Mann Ki Baat LIVE updates: PM Narendra Modi hails ISRO’s success, ballistic missile test Mann Ki Baat LIVE updates: PM Narendra Modi hails ISRO’s success, ballistic missile test The broadcast will begin at 11 am and will be broadcast by All India Radio, Doordarshan and on the prime minister’s official website: By: FE Online | New Delhi | Updated: February 26, 2017 11:13 AM The Prime Minister had congratulated the veterans who were honoured by gallantry awards during Republic Day celebrations on January 26. (Source: PTI) 
Prime Minister Narendra Modi is addressing the nation in 29th edition of his monthly radio programme ‘Mann ki Baat’. In his last January 29, PM had urged students preparing for exams to ‘smile more and score more’. The Prime Minister had congratulated the veterans who were honoured by gallantry awards during Republic Day celebrations on January 26. 
Due to ongoing pollin in Uttar Pradesh, the Center had to take permission from Election Commission to air PM’s broadcast. Therefore, it is expected that the PM will not touch upon any issue which might have political connotation to it. The broadcast will begin at 11 am and will be broadcast by All India Radio, Doordarshan and on the prime minister’s official website: 
Here are the live updates 
11.13 am: India has successfully tested Ballistic Interceptor Missile; This is a cutting edge technology in the arena of security: PM 
11.09 am: This cost effective, efficient space programme of ISRO has become a marvel for the entire world: PM Modi #MannKiBaat 
11.08 am: India created history by becoming the first country to launch successfully 104 satellites into space at one go: PM Modi 
11.05 am: After the successful mission of sending Mangalyaan to Mars, recently ISRO achieved a world record in the arena of space: PM Modi #MannKiBaat 
11.10 am: Winter is on its way out; Vasant, the season of spring has just started to step into our lives: PM Narendra Modi #MannKiBaat 
11:00 am: PM Narendra Modi’s radio broadcast begins
